page.title: 07WALKING DAY
page.content: In Atherton and the towns nearby an annual walking day is held.The walking day is usually on a Sunday in{JUNE}.People who take part walk the two main streets of Atherton starting at their respective{CHURCHES and finishing there as well. The people that walk are members of the four main churches in Atherton and various organisations connected with them.For example {ST.JOHN THE {BAPTIST}church,with the church,{THE {GUIDES AND SCOUTS},G.F.S,Sunday school,choir,congregation and { {HESKETH FLETCHER SCHOOL}walk.The walk finishes with a short service in the church.People stand at the roadside and as they see {RELATIVES}or{FRIENDS} walking give them some money.
